Docs.summary: Enables data-bound control containers to identify a data item object for simplified data-binding operations.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Container classes that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface can specify which of their properties identifies the data item for data-binding operations, such as late binding with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder> class.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface. The `SimpleSpreadsheetControl` is a control that displays tabular-style data, similar to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control. It contains a set of `SimpleSpreadsheetRow` objects.
The `SimpleSpreadsheetRow` class is a container class that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface. Although in this example the data item property is intuitively named `Data`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItem%2A> property can be implemented to map to any property or return value of a method.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItem%2A> property identifies an object that is used in data-binding operations and late-binding expressions.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to implement a type that uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface. The `SimpleSpreadsheetRow` class is a container class with a member named `Data`. It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface by mapping the `Data` property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItem%2A> property. Simplified data-binding expressions can bind to the data object using the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItem%2A> property.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/CS/idataitemcontainersample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/VB/idataitemcontainersample.vb#3)]

## Remarks In implementing classes such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex%2A> property is used to determine the index of the data item bound to the control from the data source. The <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex%2A> property does not refer to the index of the data item as displayed by the data control.
